titles: Regale lectum miseri√¶, or, A kingly bed of misery in which is contained a dreame with an elegie upon the martyrdome of Charls, late King of England, of blessed memory, and another upon the right Honorable the Lord Capel : with A curse against the enemies of peace, and The authors farewell to England / by John Quarles.
author: Quarles, John, 1624-1665.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
